name: Annoy The Man
description:
"Annoy The Man" is a simple 2D shooter. The player must throw a bullet of paper on a character, the aim is to make a max score.

I wanted to have a cute graphic universe, made with paper, and a simple gameplay 'cause I'm a beginner with code.

You can move with left and right arrow. And you can shoot with space.

This game was made for Fuck This Jam.

Don't hesitate to leave me a feedback on Twitter ;) @vdvestelle
